cowrat.recoled.audio
Interface ProfileMakerControl

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProfileMakerGUI
Deprecated. The JMF-based classes in this package have been dropped in favour of our own implementations. Use cowrat.recplaj.recorder.Recorder for audio recording and cowrat.rexplore.hnm.MakeHanmerProfile for activity logging (post-processing) instead. THIS PACKAGE IS NO LONGER USED IN RECOLED AND WILL SOON BE REMOVED.

public interface ProfileMakerControl

Interface to be implemented by everyone wishing to control ProfileMaker. (NB: not a very clean implementation: the controller must in addition get a ref to pm and setup, start and stop it as needed)

See Also:
cowrat.recplaj.recorder.Recorder, cowrat.rexplor.hnm.MakeHanmerProfile
